com.phunware.advertising

Class PwBannerAdView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • com.phunware.advertising.PwBannerAdView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public final class PwBannerAdView
extends android.view.ViewGroup
    Banners are ads that are shown within the layout of your app.

    XML only implementation example:

     <com.phunware.advertising.PwBannerAdView
      android:id="@+id/bannerAd"
      android:layout_width="wrap_content"
      android:layout_height="wrap_content"
      app:zone="YOUR_ZONE_ID"
      app:auto_load="true" />

    Simple code implementation example:

         PwBannerAdView bannerView = PwBannerAdView.getInstance(context);

     // add bannerView to activity layout...

     bannerView.startRequestingAdsForZone("YOUR_ZONE_ID");
    Instances of PwBannerAdView are not safe for use by multiple threads. Note, the PwBannerAdView automatically manages retrieving and displaying ads. Changing the visibility of the view will trigger a request for a new ad.
